events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit me properly. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as Refund based on the customer's request for a return and money back due to sizing issues.
The case was assigned to agent Emily from the Returns Department to handle the refund process and assist the customer.
Hello! My name is Emily, and I will assist you with your return request. Sorry to hear the jacket didnâ€™t fit well.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for the return?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is untouched and still in its original packaging, ready to be sent back.
Thank you for the details! I've approved your return request. Please use the prepaid return label attached to this email to send back the jacket.
Great, thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I will ship it back today and wait for the refund.
We have received your returned jacket in good condition and processed your refund, which should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I got the refund credited to my account yesterday. Thank you for your excellent support!
We are glad everything is resolved to your satisfaction. We will now close this case. Please contact us anytime if you need help.
